meanings.definition: Infected with or marked by measles.
meanings.sent1: The measled child had red spots all over.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the child was measled with measles.
meanings.sent3: The measled child looked like a walking strawberry!
meanings.sent4: Her face was measled with memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The measled appearance of the child was a clear sign of illness.

meanings.definition: Covered with small spots or blemishes.
meanings.sent1: The measled apple had tiny dots all over its skin.
meanings.sent2: The old painting was measled with small spots of paint loss.
meanings.sent3: The measled cat looked like it had been splattered with paint!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt measled with imperfections and doubts.
meanings.sent5: The measled fabric showed signs of wear and tear.
